title: Patcher not opening
body: When I try and open the League patcher to get into LoL, the logo briefly appears and then nothing else happens. This just happened today. I tried deleting lol_launcher and opening the patcher in administrator mode but nothing works

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try running through the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support article, let me know if anything helps.
